GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.14 to before v4.14.276
GSD.description:
af_netlink: Fix shift out of bounds in group mask calculation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.276 by commit ac5883a8890a11c00b32a19949a25d4afeaa2f5a, it was introduced in version v2.6.14 by commit f7fa9b10edbb9391bdd4ec8e8b3d621d0664b198. For more details please see the references link.
